title: The Weight of a New Sun
tagline: A young woman's consciousness becomes the battleground for a nation's future and her own.
themes: The Private Cost of Public Freedom
Reconciling National History with Personal Memory

chapters.title: The Ground Upon Which We Build

story: Write a stream-of-consciousness monologue from the perspective of Ezinne's mother during one of her 'headaches,' revealing the history of compromises she made.
Draft the letter Chinedu the engineer writes to his own father about his 'modern' walk with Ezinne and his expectations of a wife.
Compose a chapter from Aunty Ifeoma's youth, showing a parallel struggle for autonomy during the colonial era.
Imagine a scene where Ezinme, now at university, leads a seminar discussion that inadvertently dissects her father's political rhetoric.
technical: Build a web-based 'Consciousness Map' that visualizes the overlapping pressures on Ezinne (family, nation, history, self) as interactive, competing layers of text and sound.
Create a text generator that produces 'Letters from Authority' (father, university, government) in the formal, weighted style of the novel, allowing users to input their own decisive choices.

cover_prompt: A young African woman in mid-20th century attire stands transfixed, her hands pressed against the glass of a towering, ornate radio cabinet, from which luminous, geometric streams of historical data and fragmented memories erupt, symbolizing her consciousness under siege, set within the parlor of a colonial-era administrative building now repurposed for state broadcasting, where architectural blueprints of ideological control are superimposed over traditional textiles, in the atmospheric style of Lynette Yiadom-Boakye meets a cyberpunk-infused Njideka Akunyili Crosby, with elements of symbolic magical realism, book cover framing, centered composition with a dramatic low-angle view emphasizing both the monumental radio and the woman's determined posture, cinematic chiaroscuro lighting with a color palette of deep indigos, burnt oranges, and ethereal gold against muted earth tones, masterpiece, best quality, ultra detailed, intricate details, professional composition, sharp focus, 8k resolution, flux dev
